page.title: 12Shops in the Codford Area
page.content: In Codford there are a few shops.There is a post office which also sells lots of odds and ends like rulers and rubbers,post cards and sweets.The postmaster is Mr.Meadows.There is also a fish and chip shop which sells nice chunky fish and nice juicy chips.The owner of the fish shop is Mr.Wilkins. There is a nice antique shop which is owned by Mrs.Alder and a small supermarket run by Mr.Fishlock.We have two garages owned by Mr.Smith and opposite one garage Mr.and Mrs Bolt sell newspapers.In Stockton there is a post office run by Mrs.Taylor.And another one in Bapton run by Mr.and Mrs Bryant.Mr Weeler owns a combined fruit and vegetable shop,pet shop and wool shop.Mrs griffin is their assistant.
